description.oldValue:
Admins can enable policy so that on acceptance of a PSTN call, an automatic browser launch can happen alongside Teams, displaying relevant information (CRM data, case data, etc.) to the user.
GA date: November CY2022
description.newValue:
Admins
can enable policy so that on acceptance of a PSTN call, an automatic browser
launch can happen alongside Teams, displaying relevant information (CRM data,
case data, etc.) to the user.
